title: Tabular File
description: A file containing textual data with a tabular structure.

file_format.comment: Bed files must specify their file format type.

catalog_adapters.title: IGVF Catalog Adapters
catalog_adapters.description: IGVF Catalog Adapters that ingests this file

items.title: IGVF Catalog Adapter
items.description: Identifier pointing to a Github link of the IGVF Catalog adapter that processes this file.

content_type.comment: Content Type describes the content of the file.

enum_descriptions.barcode onlist: A list of all known barcode sequences that have been included in the assay kit and are available during library preparation.
enum_descriptions.barcode to element mapping: A file describing the mapping of barcodes to genomic elements.
enum_descriptions.barcode to hashtag mapping: A file describing the mapping of barcodes to hashtags.
enum_descriptions.barcode to sample mapping: A file describing the mapping of barcodes to biological sample.
enum_descriptions.barcode to variant mapping: A file describing the mapping of barcodes to variants.
enum_descriptions.barcode to TF overexpression mapping: A file describing the mapping of barcodes to TF overexpression.
enum_descriptions.bin paired count: Occurrences of contact between chromatin pairs within designated binned intervals.
enum_descriptions.coding variant effects: A file predicting effects of amino acid changes at each position of a given protein.
enum_descriptions.differential chromatin contact quantific: Details differences in chromatin interactions between experimental conditions.
enum_descriptions.differential element quantifications: A file that details the change in effect sizes for a specific non-coding element between two experimental conditions.
enum_descriptions.differential gene expression quantificat: The quantified changes in gene expression levels between different conditions or groups.
enum_descriptions.differential peak quantifications: The quantified changes in peaks detected between experimental conditions.
enum_descriptions.differential transcript expression quant: The quantified changes in expression levels of transcripts between conditions or groups.
enum_descriptions.DNA footprint scores: A file containing DNA footprint scores, which represents the binding sites between DNA and proteins called from assays like ATAC-seq data.
enum_descriptions.editing templates: The homology-directed DNA repair (HDR) templates containing SNVs in the library of saturation genome editing assays.
enum_descriptions.element quantifications: The quantified levels of specific genomic elements. Formatting should follow https://github.com/IGVF-DACC/checkfiles/blob/dev/src/schemas/table_schemas/element_quant.json.
enum_descriptions.elements reference: References for the genomic elements studied, including details like genomic coordinates or identifiers.
enum_descriptions.fold change over control: The ratio of expression levels or other measurements in an experimental condition relative to a control.
enum_descriptions.fragments: The quantified levels of ATAC-seq fragments.
enum_descriptions.guide quantifications: Information and sequencing read counts for each gRNA in a pooled CRISPR screen experiment.
enum_descriptions.guide RNA sequences: The sequences of guide RNAs designed for genome editing using CRISPR. Formatting should follow https://github.com/IGVF-DACC/checkfiles/blob/dev/src/schemas/table_schemas/guide_rna_sequences.json.
enum_descriptions.external source data: File containing a list of urls used as a source.
enum_descriptions.MPRA sequence designs: Sequences designed for an MPRA experiment. Formatting should follow https://github.com/IGVF-DACC/checkfiles/blob/dev/src/schemas/table_schemas/mpra_sequence_designs.json.
enum_descriptions.peaks: Detected genomic regions of relative enrichment in coverage data, such as peaks in ChIP-seq or ATAC-seq indicating protein binding sites or chromatin accessibility.
enum_descriptions.peak quantifications: The quantified levels of peaks detected in ChIP-seq or ATAC-seq assays.
enum_descriptions.prime editing guide RNA sequences: The sequences of guide RNAs designed for prime editing CRISPR experiments. Formatting should follow https://github.com/IGVF-DACC/checkfiles/blob/dev/src/schemas/table_schemas/prime_editing_guide_rna_sequences.json.
enum_descriptions.protein to protein interaction score: Scores or metrics for interactions between proteins.
enum_descriptions.reporter elements: Stores the raw format statistical activity analysis for elements associated with a reporter assay.
enum_descriptions.reporter experiment: Stores the complete raw measurements from a reporter assay.
enum_descriptions.reporter experiment barcode: Store the raw measurement on a barcode level from a reporter assay.
enum_descriptions.reporter variants: Stores the raw format statistical activity analysis for variants associated with a reporter assay.
enum_descriptions.reporter genomic element effects: Defines the activity of an element/region within a genome associated with a reporter assay.
enum_descriptions.reporter genomic variant effects: Defines the activity of a variant within a genome associated with a reporter assay.
enum_descriptions.sample sort parameters: The parameters/quantifications used for sorting biological samples, such as those in flow cytometry.
enum_descriptions.sequence barcodes: The barcodes associated with different sequences, used for sample identification and multiplexing.
enum_descriptions.tissue positions: The spatial coordinates or positions of tissue samples or sections in experiments.
enum_descriptions.variant binding effects: The genetic variant effects on transcription factor binding affinity.
enum_descriptions.variant effects: The genetic variant effects on gene expression.
enum_descriptions.variant functional predictions: Predictions of the functional effects of genetic variants.
enum_descriptions.variant localization impacts: Output of a variant painting experiement describing the measured impact of variants.
enum_descriptions.variant to element mapping: A file describing the mapping of genetic variants to genomic elements.

assembly.description: Genome assembly applicable for the tabular data.

dbxrefs.comment: This file type currently does not support any external resource submission.
